roles.title: Senior Software Development Engineer
roles.description: Driving innovation in AWS EBS storage optimization, performance engineering, and intelligent heat management at petabyte scale
achievements: Architecting next-generation storage optimization algorithms for AWS EBS, improving cost efficiency across millions of customer workloads
Leading performance engineering initiatives that enhance I/O throughput and reduce latency for block storage at cloud scale
Implementing ML-driven heat management systems to optimize data placement and thermal efficiency across distributed storage infrastructure
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise-grade storage solutions serving Fortune 500 companies

roles.title: Lead Senior Software Development Engineer
roles.description: Spearheaded technical strategy for Amazon's global payment products expansion across European and Japanese markets
achievements: Led end-to-end architecture and delivery of Amazon's co-branded credit card platform for UK, Germany, and Japan, enabling millions of customers to access seamless payment experiences
Designed and implemented secure, scalable API infrastructure connecting external banking partners across multiple regulatory environments, ensuring PCI-DSS compliance and bank-grade security
Established technical roadmaps and engineering best practices that accelerated time-to-market for new payment products by 40% across international marketplaces
Built personalized account servicing platform that increased card engagement by 35% both on and off Amazon, driving significant GMV growth
Recognized with internal Amazon award for exceptional technical leadership and customer impact

roles.title: Lead Member Of Technical Staff
roles.description: Founding engineer for Sales Enablement platform integrated with Einstein AI, revolutionizing sales coaching for the world's #1 CRM
achievements: Architected and launched AI-powered Sales Enablement product from 0 to 1, delivering real-time conversation analytics and coaching for enterprise sales teams managing multi-million dollar deals
Integrated Einstein AI to analyze conversation quality, effectiveness, and talk-to-listen ratios, providing actionable insights that improved sales rep performance by 25%
Built real-time coaching engine processing millions of sales interactions, enabling data-driven decision making and personalized feedback at scale
Delivered 360-degree visibility platform empowering distributed sales teams to achieve quota attainment from anywhere, supporting Salesforce's remote-first transformation

roles.title: Senior/Lead Software Development Engineer
roles.description: Led development of ML-powered personalization, recommendation, and supply chain systems serving 300M+ users across India's largest e-commerce platform
achievements: Won M3 Hackathon (Merchandising, Monetization, Marketing) among 30+ competing teams, delivering innovative solutions with measurable business impact
Architected and scaled personalized recommendation engine that increased product discovery by 45% and drove 30% growth in GMV across multiple categories
Built intelligent Grocery Smart Basket system using collaborative filtering and sequential pattern mining, improving basket size by 25% and customer satisfaction scores
Designed and deployed real-time ML ranking service processing 10M+ requests/day, optimizing search relevance and seller visibility across marketplace
Led development of Ekart supply chain backend systems, reducing delivery times by 20% through intelligent route optimization and demand forecasting
Established microservices architecture using Spring Boot, Docker, and Kubernetes, improving system reliability to 99.95% uptime while handling 5x traffic growth

roles.title: Machine Learning Nanodegree Graduate
roles.description: Completed intensive Machine Learning program covering supervised and unsupervised learning with hands-on industry projects
achievements: Mastered supervised learning algorithms: Linear Regression, Decision Trees, Naive Bayes, SVM, and Ensemble Methods with real-world applications
Developed expertise in unsupervised learning: Clustering, Hierarchical & Density-based methods, Gaussian Mixture Models, PCA, and ICA
Built end-to-end ML pipelines for classification, regression, and clustering problems using Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow
